description:
On this perfect mid-summer day, Javelin and friends are hungrily looking forward to the barbeque.
...but unfortunately Rodney`s misunderstanding leads to all the food being gone.
The girls then set out to find the blessings of the mountain and the fruits of the sea...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Plaża i grill to najlepsze połączenie!
Umibe to Ieba Barbecue yo ne!
海辺といえばバーベキューよね!
